name: Doggolantis
description:
Help your mermaid doggy find the long lost Atlantis at the bottom of the sea in this bullet hell dungeon crawler.

Controls:

WASD/ARROW KEY - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse - Dash

Made for Global Game Jam 2021

Credits: 

Programming: Kevin Balz, Alexandra Skogseide, Michael Tilli

Environments: Malika  Widmayer

Character art & music: Val Neumaier
